description.value:
Your suppressing attacks pin foes in place, preventing them from moving at more than a crawling pace. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppress} a target with one of your attacks, increase the speed penalty to a â€“20-foot status penalty for the duration of the suppressed condition. If the effect that imparted the suppressed condition was a critical hit, or the target critically fails its save and becomes suppressed, then the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.feat-effects.Item.5da0ZOocaoySCSJ2]{Effect: Anchoring Impacts}
